name: @mariodefe/sap-datasphere-mcp
description: Model Context Protocol server for SAP Datasphere integration with 51 tools including Table Monitoring, Instant Data Access, Task Management, and Smart Query
author: Mario DeFelipe <mario.defelipe@example.com>

scripts.postinstall: python -m pip install --upgrade sap-datasphere-mcp || echo 'Warning: Python package installation failed. Please run: pip install sap-datasphere-mcp'
